Posts.EditableText: In part three I talk all about how verbs and commands work in Quest 5.0, plus templates which are used to support multiple languages: http://www.axeuk.com/blog/2010/02/03/ve ... quest-5-0/
Posts.HTML:
In part three I talk all about how verbs and commands work in Quest 5.0, plus templates which are used to support multiple languages:

Posts.EditableText: Well, I'm ready to download and play around.  Any chance of this being possible soon?
Posts.HTML: Well, I'm ready to download and play around.  Any chance of this being possible soon?

Posts.EditableText: Yes, I'm just sorting out a few loose ends and tidying a couple of things up, and the first preview version should be available later this month.
Posts.HTML: Yes, I'm just sorting out a few loose ends and tidying a couple of things up, and the first preview version should be available later this month.
